Title: Cinematic Unfurling

Beneath the arc-light's phantom, strangers crystallize,
As sad-swell welters through the radical and tenderly disguised.
In giddy crests they plummet – lovers learning flight's disguise,
Entwined in candid intimacy, unfeathered and wise.
Queerness knotted in unspoken verse – the right, the wrong, the fervent ties,
A film reel spins the human dance, the love that underlies.
